title: Urbanization in Rwanda 2018
yAxis: Share of urban population in total population
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Share of urban population in total population. In total the number of data points it has is 11.
In general Share of urban population in total population has stayed the same over the Year.
Share of urban population in total population is roughly constant from 2008 to 2013, and finally slightly increasing from 2013 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest Share of urban population in total population, of value 17.21 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Share of urban population in total population about 16.93 was reached at Year 2008,  2009, and 2010
min_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Share of urban population in total population. In total the number of data points it has is 11.
Overall Share of urban population in total population has increased over the Year.
Share of urban population in total population is roughly constant from 2008 to 2013, and finally slightly increasing from 2013 to 2018.
